title: Community updates

properties.value: Community updates are updates related to the Old School RuneScape community, including Jagex-run events and tournaments.

Community updates are updates related to the Old School RuneScape community, including Jagex-run events and tournaments.

Chronological list of updates[edit | edit source]

Community updates are listed in reverse chronological order. For an alphabetical list, see Category:Community updates.

rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
{{ToC|right}}
'''Community updates''' are [[updates]] related to the ''Old School RuneScape'' community, including Jagex-run events and tournaments.

==Chronological list of updates==
Community updates are listed in reverse chronological order. For an alphabetical list, see [[:Category:Community updates]].

===2022===
<dpl>
category           = 2022 updates
category           = Community updates
namespace          = Update
order              = descending
ordermethod        = sortkey
include            = {Update}:date
format             = ,\n* [[{{#time: j F|,}}]] – [[%PAGE%|%TITLE%]]
noresultsheader    = There are currently no community updates for 2022.
</dpl>

===2021===
<dpl>
category           = 2021 updates

order              = descending

</dpl>
